snippet: “Back to Eden: Contemporary Artists Wander the Garden,” an exhibition at the Museum of Biblical Art, presents works by 18 artists.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Museum of Biblical Art exhibition Back to Eden: Contemporary Artists Wander the Garden, featuring works by 18 artists.
